ActionableOrchResponseEvent.name: ActionableOrchResponseEvent
ActionableOrchResponseEvent.description: Represents information about an internal or external event after actions are taken by the orchestration process and the response is recorded.

ActionableOrchSourceEvent.description: The actionable source event related to the response event.

ErrorInformation.description: The error codes and error messages related to an actionable event that failed to be processed.

EventUuid.description: A universal unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExecutedAction.description: The details about the action taken for an actionable event as executed by the actionable event orchestration framework.

ProcessingStatus.description: Specifies the processing status of the actionable event for which the response is published.

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values arenâ€™t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription to retrieve missed events that are within the retention window.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the event in the source system where the actionable event originated.
